attributes.action: Stop sex education in primary and stop promoting homosexuality in schools.
attributes.background: Children are exposed to homosexual vedios  as  young as 11 years.Children are confused and upset seeing this and the goverment is not looking at the  impact to majority of the children.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You can find out about relationships education in primary schools, and sex education in secondary schools, here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-to-teach-21st-century-relationships-and-sex-education

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
